definition: winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: He lay on the sleeping-porch and watched the winter sun slide along the taut curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在回廊里，看冬天的阳光滑过紧闭的窗帘。

sentences.english: With multiple ridges and high eaves, large houses have deep courtyards and winding corridors.
sentences.chinese: 其中的大宅重背高檐，庭院深深，回廊曲折。

sentences.english: The tower looks odd with the winding corridor.
sentences.chinese: 这个塔带回廊看起来很奇特。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the zigzagged corridor and deep courtyard demonstrate the harmony between the residence and nature.
sentences.chinese: 回廊曲折，庭院深深，体现了民居和自然的和谐之美。

sentences.english: The original roof trusses on the wall outside the cloister support.
sentences.chinese: 原来屋架全靠墙外回廊上的木柱支撑。

sentences.english: It covers an area of 290 hectares，and has halls，pavilions，corridors and bridges almost everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 它占地290公顷，亭台楼阁和回廊小桥比比皆是。

sentences.english: The portent wound in corridors of shells.
sentences.chinese: 贝壳的回廊上那些带着异兆的伤。

sentences.english: The cloisters still retain something of the quiet and seclusion of former days.
sentences.chinese: 回廊一带依然保留有几分当年的幽静出世之慨。

sentences.english: He coiled around the moist cloister pillars.
sentences.chinese: 他环抱着回廊那潮湿的柱子。

sentences.english: I heard a voice call from one end of the gallery that the light was out.
sentences.chinese: 我听到回廊一头有人喊要关灯了。

sentences.english: Pictured here is the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele in Milan, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 本图拍摄的是意大利米兰的艾曼纽回廊。

sentences.english: The sun into two layers wooden corridors, fell in the bottom of the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 阳光直透过二层木结构回廊，落在底层的天井上。

sentences.english: I found myself in a big hall girded at half its height by a gallery.
sentences.chinese: 里面是个大厅，一半高的地方有回廊把厅分成两层。

sentences.english: Peristyle of the House of Vetti, Pompeii, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 义大利，庞贝，维提之家圆柱回廊所环绕的中庭。

definition: promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
main hall of a Buddhist temple
